meta_title: CSX Gateway & Supply Chain Reliability: The 2026 Logistics Guide
meta_description: Demurrage costs rising? CSX Gateway manages the rail, but Factory AI ensures your plant assets are ready to load. Master supply chain reliability today.
title: CSX Gateway: The Definitive Guide to Rail Logistics and Plant Reliability in 2026

hero_image.alt: Hero image for CSX Gateway: The Definitive Guide to Rail Logistics and Plant Reliability in 2026

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, cinematic wide shot of a modern industrial rail siding at a manufacturing plant. In the foreground, a diverse group of reliability engineers and logistics coordinators (men and women, various ethnicities) are wearing hard hats, safety glasses, and high-visibility vests. They are looking toward a line of freight railcars being loaded by a large industrial conveyor system. One engineer in the center is holding a tablet (back of device visible only) as if checking data. The lighting is golden hour, emphasizing the scale of the industrial infrastructure. The image conveys efficiency, safety, and the intersection of heavy transport and high-tech maintenance. No text or logos in the image.
